topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Documentation Home

body.p: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade is a carrier-grade distribution of OpenStack(R) the leading open source cloud computing platform.

HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade enables carrier grade network functions virtualization (NFV) capabilities to provide communications service providers (CSPs) with an open source based cloud platform that meets their demanding reliability requirements and accelerate their transition to NFV deployments.
